ygData.from: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
ygData.subject: Tailored items for bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Several new tailoring recipes were added with the Velious expansion.  Some of these recipes were class specific.  Monks can wear items tailored from the pelts
ygData.messageBody:
Several new tailoring recipes were added with the Velious expansion. Some
of these recipes were class specific. Monks can wear items tailored from
the pelts of black panthers. Rangers use tigeraptor pelts. Not certain if
any other classes get class specific tailored items. Does anyone know if
there are new tailored items for bards only?

Galtin of E'ci


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
